Module com.calendarfx.app
Package com.serenitask.model

Class Day

java.lang.Object
com.serenitask.model.Day
public class Day extends Object
Class representing a single day as an object. A day has a date, and a series of time windows of available time for event allocation.

  • Field Details

    • priority

      private int priority
      Priority of the day when ordered based on available free time. Higher priority means more free time.

    • freeTime

      private int freeTime
      Total free time in minutes available for the day.

      Total time in minutes allocated to work-related activities.

  • Constructor Details

    • Day

      public Day()
      Base Constructor; represents a single day on a date containing windows of free time

  • Method Details

    • addWindow

      public void addWindow(LocalTime open, LocalTime close)
      Adds a window of time to the day. A window has a start and an end. The free time of the add will be totaled and added to the Day's free time.
      Parameters:
      open - Localtime object representing the start of the window
      close - Localtime object representing the end of the window

    • getPriority

      public int getPriority()
      Returns the priority of the day.
      Returns:
      Priority of the day.

    • setPriority

      public void setPriority(int priority)
      Sets the priority of the day.
      Parameters:
      priority - Priority to set for the day.

    • getFreeTime

      public int getFreeTime()
      Returns the total free time available for the day.
      Returns:
      Total free time in minutes.

    • setFreeTime

      public void setFreeTime(int freeTime)
      Sets the total free time available for the day. Note: It's generally not recommended to set freeTime directly. Use the addWindow method to manage time windows and let freeTime be calculated automatically.
      Parameters:
      freeTime - Total free time in minutes.

    • isDateSet

      public boolean isDateSet()
      Checks whether the date has been set for the day.
      Returns:
      True if the date has been set, false otherwise.

    • setDateSet

      public void setDateSet(boolean dateSet)
      Sets the flag indicating whether the date has been set for the day.
      Parameters:
      dateSet - True if the date has been set, false otherwise.

    • getBiggestWindow

      public TimeWindow getBiggestWindow()
      Returns the largest time window available for the day.
      Returns:
      Largest time window.

    • getStartDate

      public LocalDate getStartDate()
      Returns the start date of the day.
      Returns:
      Start date of the day.

    • getWorkingTime

      public int getWorkingTime()
      Getter for workingTime parameter
      Returns:
      int object representing total working time for day

    • getHealthTime

      public int getHealthTime()
      Getter for healthTime parameter
      Returns:
      int object representing total health based time for day

    • setStartDate

      public void setStartDate(LocalDate startDate)
      Setter for StartDate parameter
      Parameters:
      startDate - LocalDate object to set as StartDate

    • getEndDate

      public LocalDate getEndDate()
      Getter for EndDate parameter
      Returns:
      LocalDate object representing EndDate

    • setEndDate

      public void setEndDate(LocalDate endDate)
      Setter for EndDate parameter
      Parameters:
      endDate - LocalDate object to set as endDate

    • findBiggestWindow

      private TimeWindow findBiggestWindow()
      Function calculates the biggest window of the day. Parses all windows and returns the window with the largest difference
      Returns:
      TimeWindow object representing the largest window of the day

    • validate

      public void validate()
      Prints out validation data to ensure days are generating as required. Debug only, will be removed for final release

    • addWork

      public void addWork(int work)
      Adds work based activity time to total sum for day
      Parameters:
      work - integer representing minutes of work based events

    • addHealth

      public void addHealth(int health)
      Adds health based activity time to total sum for day
      Parameters:
      health - integer representing minutes of health based events

    • getHealthNeeded

      public int getHealthNeeded(int ratio)
      Returns an integer of total minutes needed to achieve target health ratio
      Parameters:
      ratio - integer value of ratio target
      Returns:
      minutes required to achieve target ratio
